nokey.geolocation package

Submodules

nokey.geolocation.ip_api module

class nokey.geolocation.ip_api.IP_API(use_caching=False, cache_name='ip_api_cache', backend='sqlite', expire_after=3600)[source]

Bases: object

A class to interact with the IP API.

Attributes: - base_url: The base URL of IP API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns URL for API docs.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: URL for API documentation.

get_location_info_by_ip_address(ip)[source]

Returns geolocation info (country, state, coordinates, etc.) by IP address.

Args: - ip (str): IPv4/IPv6 address or domain name.

Returns: - dict: Location information based on given IP address or domain name.

Bases: object

A class to interact with the Zippopotomus API.

Attributes: - base_url: The basee URL of the API. - about: A short description of the API.

get_docs_url()[source]

Returns the URL for the Zippopotomus API documentation.

Args: - None

Returns: - string: The URL for the API docs.

get_info_by_zipcode(country, zipcode)[source]

Returns information on a given zipcode in a given country.

Args: - country (str): The country code as defined in the API docs. See docs for supported countries. - zipcode (int): The zipcode in question. See docs for range and format of zipcodes by country.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing information about the given zipcode in the given country.

get_zipcode_by_city(country, state, city)[source]

Returns the zipcode(s) of the city matching the parameters.

Args: - country (str): The country code as defined in the API docs. - state (str): The state code. - city (str): The city in question.

Returns: - dict: A dictionary containing the zipcode of the given location.
